name: @wiki3-ai/webllm-chat-kernel
description: WebLLM chat kernel for JupyterLite using @built-in-ai/web-llm

scripts.build:labextension: npm run build:ts && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:package
scripts.build:package: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const fs = require('fs'); const out = {name: pkg.name, version: pkg.version, jupyterlab: {...pkg.jupyterlab, _build: {load: 'index.js', extension: './extension'}}}; fs.writeFileSync('dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(out, null, 2));"
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:labextension && npm run copy:labextension
scripts.copy:labextension: mkdir -p labextension && cp -r dist/* labextension/ && cp install.json labextension/
